title: Man, 3 girls shot in southeast DC
content:
WASHINGTON - D.C. Police are searching for the person who shot four people Monday night in the southeast.
The shootings happened around 11:15 p.m. in the 5100 block of Call Place.
Authorities say the victims are a man and three girls under the age of 18.
Officers say the injuries are serious, however, all four are expected to survive.
